content.question: In the context of the passage as a whole, the first sentence of the third paragraph (“Yet . . . can do”) marks the transition between

choices.label: a brief summary of a debate and a substantive analysis of that debate’s origins
an empirical investigation and a consideration of its theoretical implications
a description of a problem and an assessment of potential solutions
an explanation of a viewpoint and a rebuttal of that viewpoint

content.answer: an explanation of a viewpoint and a rebuttal of that viewpoint

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
